questions.text: What is a synonym for stubborn?
questions.explanation:
obstinate.

	In the original Letter People, Miss O was "Obstinate O" and was very stubborn.

questions.text: Who played Legolas in the "Lord of the Rings" trilogy?
questions.explanation:
Orlando Bloom & Bloom.

	Orlando Bloom was also in "Pirates of the Caribbean" with Johnny Depp.

questions.text: What is the name of the constellation that is the hunter?
questions.explanation:
Orion.

	There are two nebulae in Orion.

questions.text: According to the jingle what is my bologna's first name?
questions.explanation:
Oscar.

	"My bologna has a first name it's O S C A R. My bologna has a second name it's M A Y E R. Oscar Mayer has a way with B O L O G N A." If it weren't for that jingle I don't think I'd ever have learned to spell bologna.

questions.text: I am a giant bird. I cannot fly. According to popular myth, if frightened I will stick my head in the sand so I cannot be seen. What am I?
questions.explanation:
ostrich.

	The ostrich, the emu, and the kiwi cannot fly.

questions.text: What is the capital of Canada?
questions.explanation:
Ottawa.

	Ontario is a province in Canada. Orlando is in Florida, USA. Oslo is the capital of Norway.

questions.text: What is the name of Andy Taylor's son in "The Andy Griffith Show"?
questions.explanation:
Opie.

	Opie Taylor was played by Ron Howard who is now a famous director.

questions.text: Where is the Wizard from in "The Wizard of Oz"?
questions.explanation:
Omaha.

	Omaha is in Nebraska. He said that he was in a hot air balloon and the wind was so strong he landed in Oz.

questions.text: The words "buzz", "meow", "crash" and "giggle" are all examples of what?
questions.explanation:
onomatopoeia.

	If you thought oxymoron, that is two opposites put together, such as "sweet revenge" or my personal favorite "Microsoft Works".

questions.text: Which element has the chemical symbol O?
questions.explanation:
oxygen.

	Oxygen is one of the elements that make up water. H2O means there's two parts hydrogen and one part oxygen.
